// ==UserScript==
// @name TorLock
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @connect *://www.torlock.com/*
// @trackerURL https://www.torlock.com/
// @version 1.0
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

var code = {
  "version": 2,
  "type": "kit",
  "title": "TorLock",
  "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
  "desc": "",
  "downloadUrl": "",
  "tVersion": "",
  "search": {
    "loginUrl": "",
    "loginFormSelector": "",
    "searchUrl": "https://www.torlock.com/all/torrents/%search%.html",
    "nextPageSelector": {
      "selector": "div.col-md-8>nav>ul>li:eq(10)>a>span",
      "attr": "href"
    },
    "baseUrl": "https://www.torlock.com/",
    "requestType": "GET",
    "listItemSelector": "div.panel.panel-default>table>tbody>tr",
    "torrentSelector": {
      "title": ">td:eq(0)>div>a",
      "url": {
        "selector": ">td:eq(0)>div>a",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "size": ">td:eq(2)",
      "seed": ">td:eq(3)",
      "peer": ">td:eq(4)",
      "date": "td.td"
    },
    "onGetValue": {
      "size": [
        "convertSize"
      ],
      "date": [
        {
          "name": "timeFormat",
          "format": "3"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "uid": 509662378
};

API_exKit(code);
